byline.original: By DAVID M. HERSZENHORN and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT

abstract: Speaker Paul Ryan plans to unveil national security agenda, part of his effort to give shape to Republican Party platform for 2016 before Donald Trump is formally nominated as president; document, which is short on specifics, also seeks to address perceived security lapses that emerged under Pres Obama.
lead_paragraph: The document serves as a potential template to counter some of the more contentious proposals made by Donald Trump and as a rebuke to President Obama.

headline.main: Speaker Paul Ryan to Issue His Agenda to Improve U.S. Security
headline.print_headline: Ryan to Issue His Agenda to Improve U.S. Security

snippet: The document serves as a potential template to counter some of the more contentious proposals made by Donald Trump and as a rebuke to President Obama.
